casebody.data:
Argued April 47, STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. ROBERT DALE THEROUX, Appellant. (No. 77494) 495 P2d 765 Oscar D. Rowlett, Portland, argned the canse and filed the brief for appellant. Norman J. Smith, certified law student, Willamette University, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief were Lee Johnson, Attorney General, and John W. Osbnrn, Solicitor General, Salem.

affirmed April 17,

petition for rehearing denied May 16, 1972

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Langtry and Thornton, Jndges.
